title: From Product Manager to Technical Product Manager
description: Learning graph with 200 concepts covering the transition from product management to technical product management, including system architecture, APIs, databases, agile methodologies, analytics, and AI tools.
creator: Leah Vogel
audience: Product managers with 3-8 years of experience transitioning to technical PM roles
prerequisites: 3+ years product management experience, basic understanding of software development lifecycle
bloomLevels: All six levels (Remember, Understand, Apply, Analyze, Evaluate, Create)
